title: UNHCR Ethiopia
subtitle: 4,500 refugees received their food and cash assistance just in  hours in Bambasi Camp, thanks to the innovative Global Distribution Tool (GDT) that makes it  simpler, #Refugees present their identity documents, which bar code is scanned by a mobile phone. @UNHCRInnovationpic.twitter.com/XdFBDtzYNm

title: Living Earth Uganda
subtitle: With Kyangawli camp & district officials, @LivingEarth_Ug has sofa identified 4 main feeder roads, which selected members of the host community and refugees will be required to work on before they can be paid. through #Cash4WorkProject arrangement.pic.twitter.com/MYwXln3RfY
